707614f-a.title: Manhattan: 1st Ave. - 47th St.
707614f-a.text:
First Avenue, at and adjoining S.E. corner of 47th Street, showing
a lunch wagon, repair, tire, ahd battery service, and a service
and filling station, in the block where a number of old five-
story tenements used to stand prior to about 1931.
The building partially shown at the extreme right is the old
Wilson \& Company slaughter house, on the S.E. corner of 46th St:
July 3, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
